description: As we move forward into the world of distributed systems, microservices, and hosted platforms, we find ourselves in a world where there are more moving parts and potential points of failure than ever, in an industry that traditionally has a poor approach to error handling and failure. What are these problems? How do we solve them not only through code, but through training and processes? And how can we learn from other industries that have tackled them before?
title: You Have Control: Learning From Aviation
